entry.Ruby: CASCOON makes its protective cocoon by wrapping its body entirely with a fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens. This POKéMON prepares for its evolution inside the cocoon.
entry.Sapphire: If it is attacked, CASCOON remains motionless however badly it may be hurt. It does so because if it were to move, its body would be weak upon evolution. This POKéMON will also not forget the pain it endured.
entry.FireRedLeafGreen: Its body, which is made of soft silk, hardens over time. When cracks appear, evolution is near.
entry.Emerald: To avoid detection by its enemies, it hides motionlessly beneath large leaves and in the gaps of branches. It also attaches dead leaves to its body for camouflage.
entry.Diamond: It is hot inside its cocoon. All the cells in its body create the energy for it to evolve.
entry.Pearl: Encased within its tough cocoon, it endures attacks. It never forgets the appearance of its foes.
entry.Platinum: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.
entry.HeartGoldSoulSilver: It endures attacks with patience, because the more pain before evolution, the sturdier it becomes.
entry.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.
entry.X: Its body, which is made of soft silk, hardens over time. When cracks appear, evolution is near.
entry.Y: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.
entry.Omega Ruby: Cascoon makes its protective cocoon by wrapping its body entirely with a fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens. This Pokémon prepares for its evolution inside the cocoon.
entry.Alpha Sapphire: If it is attacked, Cascoon remains motionless however badly it may be hurt. It does so because if it were to move, its body would be weak upon evolution. This Pokémon will also not forget the pain it endured.

Pearl: Route 205, 206, 207, 208, 209, 210, 211, 212, 213, 214, 215, 218, 221, 222, Eterna Forest, Floaroma Meadow, Fuego Ironworks, Valley Windworks
